chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A1 A2), rel B1 B2 -> forall R : rel C1 C2, subrel R1 R2 -> forall (x : A1 -> C1) (y : A2 -> C2), (R2 ++> R) x y -> (R1 ++> R) x y

Premises:
subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) => forall (x : A) (y : B), R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel (rel A B) (rel A B) Arguments subrel {A B}%type_scope (R1 R2)%rel_scope : rename
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
Unnamed_thm17 : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A1 A2) (R : rel B1 B2), subrel R1 R2 -> forall (x : A1 -> B1) (y : A2 -> B2), (R2 ++> R) x y -> (R1 ++> R) x y
arrow_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) => forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y) : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, rel A1 A2 -> rel B1 B2 -> rel (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments arrow_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (RA RB)%rel_scope : rename
KLR.k2 = fun (W A1 B1 A2 B2 A B : Type) (RR : rel A1 B1 -> rel A2 B2 -> rel A B) (R1 : KLR.klr W A1 B1) (R2 : KLR.klr W A2 B2) (w : W) => RR (R1 w) (R2 w) : forall W A1 B1 A2 B2 A B : Type, (rel A1 B1 -> rel A2 B2 -> rel A B) -> KLR.klr W A1 B1 -> KLR.klr W A2 B2 -> KLR.klr W A B Arguments KLR.k2 {W A1 B1 A2 B2 A B}%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%klr_scope
sum_rel_ind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (P : A1 + B1 -> A2 + B2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : B1) (y : B2), RB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall (s : A1 + B1) (s0 : A2 + B2), (RA + RB)%rel s s0 -> P s s0
sum_rel_sind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (P : A1 + B1 -> A2 + B2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : B1) (y : B2), RB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall (s : A1 + B1) (s0 : A2 + B2), (RA + RB)%rel s s0 -> P s s0
rel_push_sind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) (P : B1 -> B2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), R x y -> P (f x) (g y)) -> forall (a : B1) (a0 : B2), R !! (f, g) a a0 -> P a a0
rel_push_ind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) (P : B1 -> B2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), R x y -> P (f x) (g y)) -> forall (a : B1) (a0 : B2), R !! (f, g) a a0 -> P a a0
Inductive rel_push (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) (R : rel A1 A2) : rel B1 B2 := rel_push_rintro : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RIntro (R x y) R !! (f, g) (f x) (g y) Arguments rel_push {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope Arguments rel_push_rintro {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope _%rel_scope
prod_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : A1 -> A2 -> Prop) (RB : B1 -> B2 -> Prop) (x1 : A1 * B1) (x2 : A2 * B2) => (RA (fst x1) (fst x2) /\ RB (snd x1) (snd x2))%type : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, (A1 -> A2 -> Prop) -> (B1 -> B2 -> Prop) -> rel (A1 * B1) (A2 * B2) Arguments prod_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
KLR.arrow_klr = fun W A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type => KLR.k2 arrow_rel : forall W A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, KLR.klr W A1 A2 -> KLR.klr W B1 B2 -> KLR.klr W (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments KLR.arrow_klr {W A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%klr_scope
arrow_subrel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (x y : rel A1 A2) (H : flip subrel x y) (x0 y0 : rel B1 B2) (H0 : subrel x0 y0) (x1 : A1 -> B1) (y1 : A2 -> B2) (H1 : (x ++> x0) x1 y1) (x2 : A1) (y2 : A2) (H2 : y x2 y2) => (fun H3 : forall y3 : B2, x0 (x1 x2) y3 -> y0 (x1 x2) y3 => (fun _ : forall y3 : A2, x x2 y3 -> x0 (x1 x2) (y1 y3) => (fun _ : x0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) -> y0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) => H0 (x1 x2) (y1 y2) (H1 x2 y2 (H...
list_rel_ind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (R : rel A1 A2) (P : list A1 -> list A2 -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), R x y -> forall (x0 : list A1) (y0 : list A2), list_rel R x0 y0 -> P x0 y0 -> P (x :: x0) (y :: y0)) -> forall (l : list A1) (l0 : list A2), list_rel R l l0 -> P l l0
option_le_ind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall y : option A2, P None y) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_le RA o o0 -> P o o0
option_le_sind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall y : option A2, P None y) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_le RA o o0 -> P o o0
sum_subrel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA1 RA2 : rel A1 A2) (HRA : subrel RA1 RA2) (RB1 RB2 : rel B1 B2) (HRB : subrel RB1 RB2) (x1 : A1 + B1) (x2 : A2 + B2) (Hx : (RA1 + RB1)%rel x1 x2) => match Hx in ((_ + _) s s0) return ((RA2 + RB2)%rel s s0) with | inl_rel_def _ _ x y H => inl_rel_def RA2 RB2 x y (HRA x y H) | inr_rel_def _ _ x y H => inr_rel_def RA2 RB2 x y (HRB x y H) end : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, Monotonic sum_rel (subrel ++> subrel ++> subrel) Arguments sum_subrel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope
KLR.k1 = fun (W A1 B1 A B : Type) (RR : rel A1 B1 -> rel A B) (R1 : KLR.klr W A1 B1) (w : W) => RR (R1 w) : forall W A1 B1 A B : Type, (rel A1 B1 -> rel A B) -> KLR.klr W A1 B1 -> KLR.klr W A B Arguments KLR.k1 {W A1 B1 A B}%type_scope _%function_scope _%klr_scope
arrow_pointwise_rel : forall A B1 B2 : Type, rel B1 B2 -> rel (A -> B1) (A -> B2)
rel_impl = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_impl {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope
Unnamed_thm5 : forall (R1 R1' : rel ?A1 ?A2) (R2 R2' : rel ?B1 ?B2), subrel R1' R1 -> subrel R2 R2' -> subrel (R1 ++> R2) (R1' ++> R2') where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
rel_inter = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y /\ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_inter {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
rel_union = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y \/ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_union {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
Inductive sum_rel (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) : rel (A1 + B1) (A2 + B2) := inl_rel_def : (RA ++> RA + RB) inl inl | inr_rel_def : (RB ++> RA + RB) inr inr Arguments sum_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope Arguments inl_rel_def {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope Arguments inr_rel_def {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope
sum_rel_refl : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 + R2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
prod_rel_sym : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Symmetric R1 -> Symmetric R2 -> Symmetric (R1 * R2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
sum_rel_preorder : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), PreOrder R1 -> PreOrder R2 -> PreOrder (R1 + R2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
sum_rel_corefl : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Coreflexive R1 -> Coreflexive R2 -> Coreflexive (R1 + R2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
sum_rel_trans : forall (R1 : rel ?A ?A) (R2 : rel ?B ?B), Transitive R1 -> Transitive R2 -> Transitive (R1 + R2) where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_subrel = fun (A B1 B2 : Type) (x y : rel B1 B2) (H : subrel x y) (x0 : A -> B1) (y0 : A -> B2) (H0 : (- ==> x) x0 y0) (a : A) => (fun H1 : forall y1 : B2, x (x0 a) y1 -> y (x0 a) y1 => (fun H2 : x (x0 a) (y0 a) => (fun H3 : x (x0 a) (y0 a) -> y (x0 a) (y0 a) => (fun H4 : y (x0 a) (y0 a) => H4) (H3 H2)) (H1 (y0 a))) (H0 a)) (H (x0 a)) : forall A B1 B2 : Type, Monotonic (arrow_pointwise_rel A) (subrel ++> subrel) Arguments arrow_pointwise_subrel {A B1 B2}%type_scope
Inductive option_le (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) : rel (option A1) (option A2) := Some_le_def : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> option_le RA (Some x) (Some y) | None_le_def : forall y : option A2, option_le RA None y Arguments option_le {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Some_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments None_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Inductive option_ge (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) : rel (option A1) (option A2) := Some_ge_def : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> option_ge RA (Some x) (Some y) | None_ge_def : forall x : option A1, option_ge RA x None Arguments option_ge {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Some_ge_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments None_ge_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope
rel_union_corefl : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Coreflexive R1 -> Coreflexive R2 -> Coreflexive (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [ |- Type]
rel_union_sym : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Symmetric R1 -> Symmetric R2 -> Symmetric (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [ |- Type]
KLR.k2_relim : forall (RR : rel ?A1 ?B1 -> rel ?A2 ?B2 -> rel ?A ?B) (R1 : KLR.klr ?W ?A1 ?B1) (R2 : KLR.klr ?W ?A2 ?B2) (w : ?W) (x : ?A) (y : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim (RR (R1 w) (R2 w)) x y P Q -> RElim (KLR.k2 RR R1 R2 w) x y P Q where ?W : [ |- Type] ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type] ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
arrow_rcompose : forall (RA12 : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RA23 : rel ?A2 ?A3) (RA13 : rel ?A1 ?A3) (B1 B2 B3 : Type) (RB12 : rel B1 B2) (RB23 : rel B2 B3) (RB13 : rel B1 B3), RDecompose RA12 RA23 RA13 -> RCompose RB12 RB23 RB13 -> RCompose (RA12 ++> RB12) (RA23 ++> RB23) (RA13 ++> RB13) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?A3 : [ |- Type]
rel_union_lub : forall R1 R2 R : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R1 R /\ subrel R2 R) subrel (R1 \/ R2) R where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r : forall R1 R2 R : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R2 R) subrel (R1 /\ R2) R where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_union_refl_r : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R2 -> Reflexive (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [ |- Type]
rel_inter_corefl_r : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Coreflexive R2 -> Coreflexive (R1 /\ R2) where ?A : [ |- Type]
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_l : forall R1 R2 R : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R1 R) subrel (R1 /\ R2) R where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
rel_union_refl_l : forall R1 R2 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R1 -> Reflexive (R1 \/ R2) where ?A : [ |- Type]

```intros A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 R1 R2 H R x y H0 x y H1.
apply Unnamed_thm17; assumption.
```

original: intros A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 R1 R2 H R x y H0 x y H1. apply Unnamed_thm17; auto.
